HandlerFunction.description: A function that receives the manifest object and returns the manifest string.

ManifestItem.description: Describes a manifest entry that links the emitted path to the producing asset.

asset.description: The compilation asset that produced this manifest entry.

filePath.description: The public path recorded in the manifest for this asset.

ManifestObject.description: Maps asset identifiers to their manifest entries.

filename.description: Specifies the filename of the output file on disk. By default the plugin will emit `manifest.json` inside the 'output.path' directory.
